column2: "Nna abowatsena no yɛ onyitsewfo kyɛn hamu abowa biara a EWURADZE Nyankopɔn ayɛ. Na obisaa ɔbaa no dɛ
column3: Aso ampaara dɛ Nyankopɔn ase hom dɛ
column4: Mma hom nndzi ture yi mu ndua nyinara bi?"

column2: "Na ɔbaa no see abowatsena no dɛ
column3: Ture yi mu ndua n'eduaba no yɛwɔ ho kwan dɛ yedzi bi;"

column2: "mbom dua a osi ture yi ne finimfin no n'eduaba no na Nyankopɔn ase dɛ
column3: Mma yenndzi
column4: nkyii so mma yɛmmfa hɛn nsa nnka

column2: "Na abowatsena no buaa ɔbaa no dɛ
column3: Hom nnkowu bi:"

column2: "osiandɛ Nyankopɔn nyim dɛ da a hom bedzi bi no
column3: hom enyi bobue
column4: na hom ayɛ dɛ Nyankopɔn  na hom ehu papa nye bɔn."
column5: "#3.5 NYANKOPƆN: Hibriw no n'asekyerɛ tum so gyina hɔ ma “enyame”."

column2: "Na ɔbaa no hun dɛ dua no ye dɛ wodzi
column3: na ɔyɛ enyiwa do fɛw
column5: na otum so dɛ obue enyi no
column6: ɔtseew n'aba no bi dzii; na ɔmaa no kun a ɔka no ho no so bi

column2: "Na hɔn beenu no nyinara hɔn enyiwa buebuei
column3: na wohun dɛ wodzi adagyaw; na wɔpempaam adɔmbadua n'ahataw

column2: "Na ewimbir no
column3: wɔtsee EWURADZE Nyankopɔn ne nka dɛ ɔnam ture no mu
column4: na Adam nye ne yer no sumae fii EWURADZE Nyankopɔn n'enyim wɔ ture no mu ndua no mu."

column2: "Na EWURADZE Nyankopɔn frɛɛ banyin no na obisaa no dɛ
column3: Ewɔ hen?"

column2: "Na banyin no buaa dɛ
column3: Metsee wo ndze wɔ ture no mu
column5: osiandɛ midzi adagyaw; na musumaa moho."

column2: "Na obisaa no dɛ
column3: Woana kaa kyerɛɛ wo dɛ idzi adagyaw? Ana edzi dua a mehyɛɛ wo ho mbra dɛ mma nndzi bi no bi?"

column2: "Na banyin no see dɛ
column3: ɔbaa no a edze no bɛkaa mo ho no
column4: ɔno na ɔmaa me dua no bi

column2: "Na EWURADZE Nyankopɔn bisaa ɔbaa no dɛ
column3: Ebɛnadze na ayɛ yi? Na ɔbaa no see dɛ
column4: Abowatsena no na ɔdaadaa me ma midzii."

column2: "Na EWURADZE Nyankopɔn see abowatsena no dɛ
column3: Osiandɛ ayɛ iyi ntsi
column4: wɔadom wo wɔ fiembowa nyinara mu
column5: na hamu mbowadoma nyinara mu; wo yafun do na ebɛnantsew
column6: na huntuma na ibedzi wo nkwa nda nyinara."

column2: "Medze ɔtan mobɔto ɔwo nye ɔbaa no ntamu
column3: na w'asefo nye n'asefo ntamu: ɔbɔbɔ wo tsir

column2: "Ɔsee ɔbaa no dɛ
column3: Mebɛma w'awoko mu amandzehu adɔɔ so kɛse; ɔfona mu na ebɔwo mba; na ebɛdan wo kun

column2: "Na ɔsee Adam dɛ
column3: Osiandɛ etsie wo yer ne ndze
column4: na edzi dua a mehyɛɛ wo ho mbra dɛ
column5: Mma nndzi bi no bi ntsi
column6: wɔadom asaase wɔ ɔwo ntsi; ɔfona mu na ibedzidzi do wo nkwa nda nyinara;"

column2: "nhwirom nye nsoɛ so na obefifir ama wo; na ibedzi hamu ahaban;"
"w'enyim mfifir mu na ibedzidzi kɛpem dɛ ebɛsan akɔ daadze; osiandɛ ɔno mu na woyii wo fii: na huntuma nye wo
column3: na huntuma mu na ebɛsan akɔ."

column2: "Na banyin no too ne yer no dzin Eve; osiandɛ ɔno na ɔyɛ atseasefo nyinara hɔn na."
"Na EWURADZE Nyankopɔn yɛɛ nwoma ntar maa Adam nye ne yer
column3: na ɔdze hyɛɛ hɔn."

column2: "Na EWURADZE Nyankopɔn see dɛ
column3: Hwɛ
column4: nyimpa no abɛyɛ dɛ hɛn mu kor
column5: ohu papa nye bɔn; na afei bɛyɛ na ɔatsen ne nsa
column6: na ɔatsew nkwadua no so bi edzi

column2: "dɛm ntsi EWURADZE Nyankopɔn tuu nyimpa fii Eden ture no mu dɛ ɔnkɔdɔw daadze a woyii no fii mu no."
"Na oyii nyimpa no edzi; na ɔdze Kerubim
column3: nye gya nkrantsee a onyinanyinam
column4: sii Eden ture no enyim boka
column5: dɛ wɔnweɔn nkwadua no ho kwan no."
column6: "#3.24 KERUBIM: Atseasefo bi a wɔwɔ sor na wɔbɔ ndzɛmba krɔnkrɔn ho ban."
